summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Feb. 7
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Tuesday, with seven gaining and the other 12 declining.
Bitcoin rose 1% to $23,234 by market close.
